title: At the Laver Cup, Federer, Djokovic, Nadal and Murray Make Team Europe Formidable
description: Team World has never won the cup, and now it will face the rare dream team of Novak Djokovic, Rafael Nadal, Andy Murray and the retiring Roger Federer.
dc:creator: Cindy Shmerler
media:description: Roger Federer, right, and Rafael Nadal will play together for Team Europe at the Laver Cup.
